attributes.action: BE FAIR WITH INTERNATIONAL STUDENT REGARDING TOEIC ISSUE
attributes.additional_details:
INTERNATIONAL STUDENTS WHO DID TOEIC IN LAST 4 YEARS ARE SEVERELY PUNISHED BY GOVERNMENT. NONE STUDENT BEEN GIVEN OPPORTUNITY TO A FAIR TRIAL AND THE EVIDENCE AGAINST THEM HAS NEVER BEEN SHOWN TO THEM.
SINCE JANUARY 2014 TOEIC EXPOSURE NO ACTION HAS BEEN TAKEN AGAINST ALLEGED BODY ETS AND THE COLLEGE WHERE THE TEST WAS SUPERVISED.
GOVERNMENT SHOULD PUNISH CRIMINALS BUT NOT INNOCENT.
EVERY ONE SHOULD HAVE A RIGHT TO KNOW WHAT WRONG HE OR SHE HAS DONE.
GOVERNMENT IS REQUESTED TO PROVIDE OPPORTUNITY TO ALL SO THAT INNOCENT ARE NOT CATEGORISED AS CRIMINALS.
STUDENT HAS ALWAYS BEEN CONSIDERED TOP ECONOMY INCOME IN UK. THE STUDENTS WHO CHANGE THE WORLD WITH THEIR ABILITIES NOW HAS BEEN MARKED WITH THE WORD CRIMINAL.
WE ALL STAND UNITED AGAINST ANY CRIMINAL ACTIVITY NO ONE HAS RIGHT TO COMMIT A CRIME HOWEVER ALL INNOCENT UNTIL PROVEN GUILTY AND THE EVIDENCE MUST BE AGAINST THEM. JUSTICE SHOULD NOT ONLY BE DONE BUT SHOULD SEEN TO BE DONE.
